project.name: J-C564B-LUCE-06-ST02-DT03-DF18-CF26-01
project.description: Using Hibernate to execute a dynamic SQL statement with built-in user-controlled input can allow an attacker to modify the statement's meaning or to execute arbitrary SQL commands.
